amendment.description: To improve the bill by striking section 2, relating to reduction of benefits for senior executives and certain health care employees of the Department of Veterans Affairs convicted of a felony.

vote.text: Amendment SA 218 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 218 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Moran.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 218 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 218 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Moran.
